sectors.name: Technology
sectors.description: Comprehensive technology sector covering software development, data science, cybersecurity, infrastructure, and digital innovation.

branches.name: Software Development & Engineering
branches.description: Core of building applications and systems

specializations.name: Frontend Development
specializations.description: Focuses on the user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) of a website or app (what the user sees and interacts with).

specializations.name: Backend Development
specializations.description: Focuses on the server, database, and application logic that power the frontend (what the user doesn't see).

specializations.name: Full-Stack Development
specializations.description: A hybrid role that handles both frontend and backend tasks.

specializations.name: Mobile Development
specializations.description: Specializes in building applications for mobile devices (e.g., iOS Developer, Android Developer).

specializations.name: Game Development
specializations.description: Focuses on building video games, including graphics, physics, and game logic.

specializations.name: Software Engineering in Test (SET) / QA Automation
specializations.description: Writes code specifically to test other software and build automated testing systems.

branches.name: Data & Artificial Intelligence
branches.description: Focused on managing, interpreting, and leveraging data

specializations.name: Data Analytics
specializations.description: Focuses on interpreting historical data to find trends and answer business questions (What happened? Why?).

specializations.name: Data Science
specializations.description: Uses statistics, machine learning, and programming to make predictions and build models (What will happen?).

specializations.name: Data Engineering
specializations.description: Builds and maintains the 'pipelines' and infrastructure that collect, store, and prepare large volumes of data for analysis.

specializations.name: AI / Machine Learning Engineering
specializations.description: Specializes in designing and building complex artificial intelligence and predictive models.

specializations.name: Database Administration (DBA)
specializations.description: Manages, secures, and maintains the health and performance of a company's databases.

branches.name: Cybersecurity
branches.description: Dedicated to protecting data, networks, and systems from threats

specializations.name: Cybersecurity Analyst / InfoSec Analyst
specializations.description: The front line of defense; monitors networks, investigates alerts, and responds to security incidents.

specializations.name: Penetration Tester / Ethical Hacker
specializations.description: Paid to legally hack into systems to find vulnerabilities before malicious actors do.

specializations.name: Security Engineering
specializations.description: Designs and builds secure network and system architectures.

specializations.name: Governance, Risk & Compliance (GRC)
specializations.description: Focuses on policy, law, and standards (like GDPR, HIPAA, ISO 27001) to ensure the company is following security rules.

branches.name: IT Infrastructure & Cloud
branches.description: The backbone that supports all other technology functions

specializations.name: Cloud Engineering
specializations.description: Manages and builds infrastructure on cloud platforms like Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, or Google Cloud (GCP).

specializations.name: DevOps Engineering
specializations.description: Bridges the gap between Software Development (Dev) and IT Operations (Ops), focusing on automation, deployment, and efficiency (CI/CD).

specializations.name: Network Engineering / Administration
specializations.description: Manages the internal and external networks (Wi-Fi, routers, switches, LAN/WAN) that allow computers to communicate.

specializations.name: Systems Administration
specializations.description: Manages the company's servers, operating systems (like Linux or Windows Server), and core IT functions.

specializations.name: IT Support / Help Desk
specializations.description: Provides direct technical support to employees, troubleshooting hardware, software, and access issues.

branches.name: Product & Project Management
branches.description: Organize the work and define the why and what to build

specializations.name: Technical Project Manager
specializations.description: Organizes the timeline, resources, and budget to ensure a technology project is completed on time.

specializations.name: Product Manager
specializations.description: Decides what gets built. They represent the customer, define product features, and align the technology with business goals.

specializations.name: Scrum Master / Agile Coach
specializations.description: A specific role that facilitates the Agile development process, removes obstacles, and coaches the team.

specializations.name: Business Analyst (Technical)
specializations.description: Works as a liaison between business stakeholders and the tech team to translate business needs into technical requirements.

branches.name: Design & User Experience
branches.description: Focuses on the human side of technology

specializations.name: UX Designer (User Experience)
specializations.description: Researches user behavior to design a product that is logical, intuitive, and easy to use.

specializations.name: UI Designer (User Interface)
specializations.description: Focuses on the visual elements of a product (buttons, colors, typography, layout) to make it beautiful and functional.

specializations.name: UX Researcher
specializations.description: Conducts interviews, surveys, and usability tests to understand user needs and pain points.

sectors.name: Healthcare
sectors.description: Healthcare sector covering medical services, patient care, health administration, and medical technology.

branches.name: Clinical Care
branches.description: Direct patient care and medical services

specializations.name: Registered Nurse (RN)
specializations.description: Provides direct patient care, administers medications, and coordinates with physicians.

specializations.name: Physician Assistant (PA)
specializations.description: Practices medicine under physician supervision, diagnoses and treats patients.

specializations.name: Medical Technologist
specializations.description: Performs laboratory tests and analyzes results to help diagnose medical conditions.

specializations.name: Physical Therapist
specializations.description: Helps patients recover from injuries and manage chronic conditions through exercise and therapy.

branches.name: Healthcare Administration
branches.description: Management and administrative roles in healthcare settings

specializations.name: Healthcare Administrator
specializations.description: Manages healthcare facilities, coordinates services, and ensures quality patient care.

specializations.name: Health Information Manager
specializations.description: Manages patient records, ensures data privacy, and maintains electronic health records systems.

specializations.name: Medical Billing & Coding Specialist
specializations.description: Processes insurance claims and codes medical procedures for billing purposes.

branches.name: Public Health
branches.description: Community health and population health management

specializations.name: Public Health Analyst
specializations.description: Analyzes health trends and develops programs to improve community health outcomes.

specializations.name: Health Educator
specializations.description: Develops and implements programs to educate communities about health and wellness.

specializations.name: Epidemiologist
specializations.description: Studies disease patterns and outbreaks to protect public health.

sectors.name: Finance
sectors.description: Financial services including banking, accounting, investment, and financial planning.

branches.name: Banking & Financial Services
branches.description: Traditional banking and financial institution roles

specializations.name: Commercial Banker
specializations.description: Works with businesses to provide loans, credit, and financial services.

specializations.name: Investment Banker
specializations.description: Helps companies raise capital, execute mergers and acquisitions, and provide financial advisory services.

specializations.name: Credit Analyst
specializations.description: Evaluates the creditworthiness of individuals and businesses for loans and credit.

specializations.name: Risk Manager
specializations.description: Identifies and manages financial risks for banks and financial institutions.

specializations.name: Certified Public Accountant (CPA)
specializations.description: Prepares financial statements, performs audits, and provides tax services.

specializations.name: Management Accountant
specializations.description: Analyzes financial data to help organizations make strategic business decisions.

specializations.name: Internal Auditor
specializations.description: Evaluates internal controls and ensures compliance with regulations.

specializations.name: Tax Specialist
specializations.description: Provides tax planning and preparation services for individuals and businesses.

specializations.name: Financial Advisor
specializations.description: Provides investment advice and helps clients plan for retirement and financial goals.

specializations.name: Portfolio Manager
specializations.description: Manages investment portfolios and makes buy/sell decisions for clients.

specializations.name: Financial Analyst
specializations.description: Analyzes financial data and market trends to provide investment recommendations.

sectors.name: Education
sectors.description: Educational services including teaching, administration, and educational technology.

branches.name: Teaching & Instruction
branches.description: Direct teaching roles in educational settings

specializations.name: Elementary School Teacher
specializations.description: Teaches core subjects to students in grades K-5, focusing on foundational skills.

specializations.name: Secondary School Teacher
specializations.description: Teaches specific subjects (math, science, English, etc.) to middle and high school students.

specializations.name: Special Education Teacher
specializations.description: Works with students who have learning disabilities or special needs.

specializations.name: Adult Education Instructor
specializations.description: Teaches adults in continuing education, GED prep, or vocational training programs.

branches.name: Educational Administration
branches.description: Leadership and administrative roles in education

specializations.name: School Principal
specializations.description: Manages school operations, supervises staff, and ensures academic excellence.

specializations.name: Curriculum Developer
specializations.description: Designs educational programs and learning materials for schools and institutions.

specializations.name: Education Policy Analyst
specializations.description: Researches and develops policies to improve educational systems and outcomes.

specializations.name: EdTech Specialist
specializations.description: Implements and manages educational technology tools and platforms.

specializations.name: Instructional Designer
specializations.description: Creates online courses and digital learning experiences.

sectors.name: Retail
sectors.description: Retail sector covering sales, customer service, merchandising, and retail management.

specializations.name: Retail Sales Associate
specializations.description: Assists customers, processes transactions, and maintains store appearance.

specializations.name: Customer Service Representative
specializations.description: Handles customer inquiries, resolves issues, and provides support via phone, chat, or email.

specializations.name: Sales Manager
specializations.description: Leads sales teams, sets sales goals, and develops sales strategies.

specializations.name: Merchandise Buyer
specializations.description: Selects products to sell, negotiates with vendors, and manages inventory.

specializations.name: Visual Merchandiser
specializations.description: Designs store displays and layouts to maximize sales and customer engagement.

specializations.name: Inventory Manager
specializations.description: Manages stock levels, coordinates supply chains, and ensures product availability.

specializations.name: Store Manager
specializations.description: Oversees daily store operations, manages staff, and ensures profitability.

specializations.name: Retail Operations Analyst
specializations.description: Analyzes sales data, identifies trends, and optimizes retail processes.
